errors.e4001: Wallet connection request rejected. Please connect your wallet.

rules.rule1: Important: Plans return are float and daily profit for a new deposit will increase by 0.1% daily
rules.rule2: Minimum deposit amount is 0.01 BNB and you can have multiple deposits
rules.rule3: Earnings every moment, withdraw instantly any time (if you did not use capitalization of interest in Plan 4, Plan 5 and Plan 6)

referral.line7: Note! You need to have at least 1 deposit to start receive earnings

info.info1: Total income: based on your tarrif plan (from 19% to 23% daily)
info.info2: Basic interest rate: +0.1% every 24 hours - only for new deposits
info.info3: Minimal deposit: 0.01 BNB, no maximal limit
info.info4: Earnings every moment, withdraw any time (if you use capitalization of interest you can withdraw only after end of your deposit)
